findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: Using SafeMath library when native Solidity arithmetic operations can be used, resulting in unnecessary complexity and gas consumption.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Variables initialized only in the constructor are not defined as immutable.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Not following Solidity naming conventions, affecting code readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Incomplete implementation of events in the contract.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Presence of dead code, making the contract harder to understand and maintain.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Missing checks for zero values in variable setters, potentially leading to unexpected behavior or errors.

findings.title: L17 - Usage of Solidity Assembly
findings.description: Using assembly code without proper testing and debugging, making it error-prone.
